IndexArray Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node»GrowableFunction. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Array Input TerminalReturns a reference to the array input. Details
Index CountGets or sets the number of indexes. On a set, this property expands the node to accommodate the number of indexes you specify. Details
Index Terminals[][]Returns an array of references to the index terminals. Details
Output Terminals[]Returns an array of references to the index array output terminals. Details
